    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2831</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ask Kids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie Zicklein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demandez Aux Gosses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pergunte A Miúdos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chieda Ai Capretti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρωτήστε τα κατσίκια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pregunte A Cabritos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simple search engine for kids aged from 6-12, good for use on research projects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">search engine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">library</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">research</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein einfaches Search Engine für Zicklein alterte
von 6-12, gut für Gebrauch auf Forschung Projekten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Search Engine simple pour des gosses a vieilli
de 6-12, bon pour l'usage sur des projets de recherche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Search Engine simples para miúdos envelheceu 
de 6-12, bom para o uso em projetos de pesquisa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Search Engine semplice per i capretti è 
invecchiato da 6-12, buon per uso sui progetti di ricerca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια απλή μηχανή αναζήτησης για τα κατσίκια γέρασε 
από 6-12, καλός για τη χρήση στα ερευνητικά προγράμματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Search Engine simple para los cabritos 
envejeció a partir de la 6-12, bueno para el uso en proyectos de 
investigación.</string>
          </description>
